sentences.en: a group of apolitical young professional people
sentences.cn: 一群不问政事的年轻专业人士

sentences.en: Adjudication of individual disputes is often thought to call for independent, apolitical judgment.
sentences.cn: 裁断个人间的纠纷常常被认为需要独立和无政治意义的判断.

sentences.en: Henry used to be totally apolitical, but I think he is now politically more aware.
sentences.cn: 基辛格过去完全不问政治, 但是,我认为现在他政治上比较敏锐了.

sentences.en: The China - Italy Chamber of Commerce ( CICC ) is a free, elective apolitical no - profit association of enterprises.
sentences.cn: 中国意大利商会是一家民间的,自发的, 非盈利性组织.

trans.tran_cn: 对政治不感兴趣的，与政治无关的，无政治意义的
trans.tran_en: not interested in politics, or not connected with any political party
